channel.title: Tools on Dijure | Digital Architectures with a hint of Java
channel.description: Recent content in Tools on Dijure | Digital Architectures with a hint of Java

item.title: K9s
item.description: This lab introduces you to K9s and a handful of helpful features.

item.title: Kubeapps
item.description: This lab teaches you how to use the primary features of Kubeapps , a convenient dashboard for managing the installation of Helm charts and Operators.

item.title: Kubectl CLI Plugin Development
item.description: This lab takes you through the introductory steps for developing a kubectl plugin.

item.title: Kubectl CLI Plugins
item.description: The Kubectl command-line tool can be extended with plugins. These useful plugins are mostly underutilized by the community.

item.title: Registries
item.description: As a developer of containers and Kubernetes solutions, there is often a need to publish and pull containers through a private registry.
